path.style: fill: #ffffff; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 25px; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round;

fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 25px; stroke-linecap: round;
fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 25px; stroke-linecap: round;
